meanings.sent1: The blottiest paper had the most ink stains on it.
meanings.sent2: She used the blottiest tissue to clean up the spill.
meanings.sent3: The blottiest page in the book looked like a colorful painting.
meanings.sent4: His blottiest shirt told a story of a messy lunch.
meanings.sent5: The blottiest sky at sunset was a beautiful sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: That was the blottiest painting I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The blottiest fabric absorbed all the spilled coffee.
meanings.sent3: The blottiest dog in the park left paw prints everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her blottiest notebook was a mess of doodles and notes.
meanings.sent5: The blottiest carpet in the room showed years of use.
